title: PICS: Inside Bontle’s intimate baby shower
text:
PICS: Inside Bontle’s intimate baby shower share this

TV presenter Bontle Modiselle had a surprise baby shower with close friends and family this past weekend.

The white-and-gold-themed celebration was attended by her sisters, Refilwe and Candice, and hubby Priddy Ugly.

Beautiful snaps were taken by a professional photographer and Dineo and Solo Langa were also part of the special day.

Read more: Bontle Modiselle and Priddy Ugly tie the knot in beautiful ceremony

The mom-to-be, who is pregnant with her first child, was dressed in a white gypsy dress which showed off her baby bump perfectly. We think she’s making pregnancy look like a breeze – she recently also had a topless pregnancy photoshoot with her hubby.

Read more: Bontle Modiselle’s intimate surprise bridal shower

Taking to Instagram, Candice shared a cute picture from the baby shower and expressed her excitement at becoming an aunt.

“My pride and joy. My face says it all. Also, I’m about to be the most BOMB RICH AUNTY if ever there was,” Candice wrote.

Photographer WendyImages shared snaps from the baby shower.

Check out the pictures below:
description: TV presenter Bontle Modiselle had a surprise baby shower with close friends and family this past weekend.
